text.section: Every state administering agency shall submit any block grant application for the following fiscal year to the Legislative Research Commission no less than ninety (90) days prior to the date of submission, as required by federal law, of the block grant application to the federal administering agency or no less than ninety (90) days before the state administering agency elects to submit the block grant application to the federal administering agency.

Each state administering agency shall, upon request of the Commission, make available to the Commission all background data and supporting information related to each block grant application under review by the Commission as will enable the Commission to perform its functions in an informed and efficient manner.

law.history: Amended 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 387, sec. 16, effective July 15, 1994. -- Amended 1984 Ky. Acts ch. 308, sec. 2, effective July 13, 1984. -- Created 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 455, sec. 2, effective July 1, 1982.
